name: Sea monsters assault
description:
Small game in Python using Pygame and Pygbag to upload it to itchio.

Earth is being threaten by sea monsters! You got into your armored submarine and your goal is to kill all the sea monsters.

Use the Arrows to move and the SPACE bar to shoot lasers but be careful because the sea monsters will shoot back. Don't let the monsters get to the secure area!

Images were made using Stable diffusion 

Sea monsters Assault Sounds are from https://freesound.org/ including:

https://freesound.org/people/bongmoth/sounds/156565/

https://freesound.org/people/soneproject/sounds/346425/

Modified version of ->  https://freesound.org/people/FiveBrosStopMosYT/sounds/539350/
